name: BURROW (alligatorventures)
description:
yes hello

this is the first demo of my game, "Burrow".  this version is a glitchy and stylistic mess but you are more than welcome to try it out. it might freeze for a few seconds at times.

right now it's just a character creator and a tutorial level.

i wanted to release this as a browser demo on the first, but i don't really know what i'm doing with browser demos, so here we are.

it also uses a lot of default unity stuff which is going to go soon, believe me

⚠️please don't get attached to anything you create, i can't guarantee your creations will be compatible with later versions⚠️

you can read a little more about where this project is going on my website:

alligator.ventures/burrow.html
